```Python
/getreply Request => 
{'cid': 10086, 'start_sequ': 'Human', 'restart_sequ': 'Neko', 'prompt': " What's your name?", 'role': '', 'character': ['string'], 'head': '', 'model': 'text-davinci-003'}

```

issues.body:
amd64 debian11 ç”¨dockerå®‰è£…ã€‚

```

curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/latest/download/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
chmod a+x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
ln -s /usr/local/bin/docker-compose /usr/bin/dc
dc -v

git clone https://github.com/LLMKira/Openaibot
cd Openaibot/Config

æŠŠ app.toml å’Œ service.json æ”¾åˆ° Config ç›®å½•é‡Œ

issues.title: `load_model` does not return WordVectorModel or SupervisedModel any more
issues.body:
log warning :
`load_model` does not return WordVectorModel or SupervisedModel any more, but a `FastText` object which is very similar.

fix this bug:
- https://github.com/facebookresearch/fastText/issues/1056#issuecomment-1077398495

- https://github.com/facebookresearch/fastText/issues/1056#issuecomment-1278058705
issues.author: markwhitey

comments.author: sudoskys
comments.body: This fix will be pushed in the next feature release, thank you for your assistance!

issues.title: PytzUsageWarning: The zone attribute is specific to pytz's interface; please migrate to a new time zone provider.
issues.body:
log warning:
`/usr/local/lib/python3.9/dist-packages/apscheduler/triggers/interval.py:66: PytzUsageWarning: The normalize method is no longer necessary, as this time zone supports the fold attribute (PEP 495). For more details on migrating to a PEP 495-compliant implementation, see https://pytz-deprecation-shim.readthedocs.io/en/latest/migration.html`

fix:
https://github.com/agronholm/apscheduler/discussions/570#discussioncomment-3383707
